channel.title: Making npcs talk?
channel.description:
How do i make my genie's talk? Ive spawned them in autospawn.cfg, now how do i get them to say
"welcome to tweezyscape"
and the other tells people when im offline, or online with the name "tweezy"
so it will say
tweezy is online/offline!
HELP PLZ

item.title: Making npcs talk?
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

kk ive done “welcome to tweezyscape” ive aded a legands gaurd, how 2 i get him 2 say "Tweezy is offline (if im offline) online (if im online)

Read full topic

item.title: Making npcs talk?
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

find where other like this are in NPC handler and add this

if (npcs[i].npcType == 409) {
if (misc.random2(50) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Welcome to Tweezyscape”;
additem(1050, 1);
}
}

and you can have a genie also say your online or offline so you will have to use a different NPC

Read full topic
